character.name: Natasha
description: An <c=textBold>actual</c> hacker. Her cards often <c=keyword>exhaust after several uses</c> and <c=keyword>apply negative statuses to enemies</c>.

description.stateful: This action triggers every {{N}} of {{M}} times this card is played (currently {{Current}}/{{M}}).
description.stateless: This action triggers every {{N}} of {{M}} times this card is played.

x.TimesPlayed: <c=action>X</c> = times this card was played this combat, including this play.
x.LimitedUses: <c=action>X</c> = times this <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card can still be played, excluding this play.

Veiling.name: Veiling Aura
Veiling.description: Reduce incoming hits by <c=C2FF60>1</c> and <c=downside>decrease this by <c=C2FF60>1</c></c>.

description.stateful: This card can be used <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> times this combat before it gets <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>.
description.stateless: This card can be used <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> times each combat before it gets <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>.

AuraMastery.name: AURA MASTERY
AuraMastery.description: Every 2 <c=status>VEILING AURA</c> you gain, gain 1 <c=status>FEEDBACK AURA</c> or <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c> at random.

ChangePerspective.name: Perspective Change
ChangePerspective.description: Convert any <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> into {{ConvertToIntensifyAmount}} <c=status>intensify</c> or {{ConvertToAuraAmount}} of a different <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.
